resources.string: To get started simply tap the + at the top.
Search for someone that has been in a movie or TV show. As long as they are listed on TMDB.org you can select them.
Once you have at least 2 people chosen tap Compare Filmography to see what projects they have in common. You can add as many people as you want.

A list of shared filmography will be displayed as long as the people you have selected have projects in common. You will be told there is no shared projects if that is the case. You can tap on a movie or TV show for more information about the project.
The details screen will give you more information about the project ranging from synopsis to release date as well as the roles of the people you selected.
